attributes.action: Claim back excess Olympics Costs from G4S
attributes.additional_details:
After the woeful under-delivery of Contractor G4S in relation to their contracted obligation to supply sufficient trained security staff for the Olympic Games 2012 it has been necessary at the last minute to draft in 3,500 soldiers and an unknown number of extra Police Officers to fill this shortfall.

It is our belief that G4S, as a commercial enterprise, should be invoiced for the full cost of the 3,500 soldiers and extra Police Officers, including their accommodation and feeding costs.
